newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Perrigo Co estimates up.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Perrigo Co estimates up.

text.p: -- Everen Securities said Wednesday it raised its estimate for earnings from operations for Perrigo Co to $0.67 a share from $0.65 from fiscal 1997 and to $0.78 from $0.76 for fiscal 1998.
-- The estimate for the fourth quarter of fiscal 1997 remains $0.13 a share.
-- Perrigo reported better than expected fiscal third quarter earnings before charges of $0.18 a share, up from $0.15.
-- Perrigo is rated market perform in the near-term and outperform for the longer term.
